address: Xã Hải Thắng, Huyện Tiên Lữ, Tỉnh Hưng Yên
thought:
**My Analysis of the Vietnamese Address Mapping**

Okay, so I've been tasked with mapping this old Vietnamese address to its modern equivalent. First, I identified the old province, "Tỉnh Hưng Yên". Then, I checked the relevant resolutions to see if Hưng Yên had been merged or altered. Resolution 60-NQ/TW clarified that Hưng Yên *remains* Hưng Yên, so that's straightforward.

Next, I zeroed in on the old ward: "Xã Hải Thắng". I meticulously searched the "Other resolutions" for mentions of this specific ward. I found it referenced in resolution 1666/NQ-UBTVQH15. This resolution states that "Xã Thiện Phiến, Hải Thắng and Thụy Lôi were all merged into a new ward called "**xã Tiên Lữ**."

With the new ward name in hand, "xã Tiên Lữ", I now needed to cross-reference this with the provided list of "New wards." I checked each entry, and I found a perfect match: a "Xã Tiên Lữ" belonging to "Tỉnh Hưng Yên" with the ward code "12364". This is the new mapping for the old address.

Given the direct and clear resolution and the perfect match in the new ward list, I'm confident in this mapping. I will therefore create the output JSON containing the citation from the resolution (the header and the precise line), a confidence level of "high," the new province and ward information that I found and referenced. I believe this will be a precise mapping of the address.

citation.header: 1666/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Hưng Yên
citation.line: 3. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các xã Thiện Phiến, Hải Thắng và Thụy Lôi thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Tiên Lữ.
